scripts.deploy: node generate && npm run typedoc && firebase deploy
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --out ./build/website/typedoc --name maquette --target ES6 --module ES6 --mode file --readme none --gaID UA-58254103-1 --excludePrivate --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported ./typedoc/extensions.d.ts ../typings/extensions.d.ts ../src/interfaces.ts ../src/mapping.ts ../src/h.ts ../src/cache.ts ../src/projector.ts ../src/dom.ts ../src/utilities/window-performance-projector-logger.ts
